body:
A list of all the teased features that are compiled here and may/may not come. All these are pulled from public sources. If you have any updates, post them below.

Tournament
[+] Booking scrimmage servers via website
[+] Scrimmage servers in-game via /server

Gamemodes
[+] "Blockade" (Avicade Minigame)
[+] "Cave In" (Avicade Minigame)
[+] "Chroma" (Avicade Minigame)
[+] "Platform" (Avicade Minigame)
[+] "Icarus" (Avicade Minigame)

Website

EDIT: Removed anything borderline questionable. This is simply an informative to showcase things that are publicly available and may come.
